title: OSE-40-EscortBookingConfirmation-Request-Response.schema
description: Schema for ESP response to an escorting request. Processing the request is asynchronous so this response payload simply includes a ESP generated receipt Id.

quoteRef.description: Unique Id for this escort quote - generated by RMP.

receiptId.description: A unique Id generated by the ESP to identify receipt of this booking request. A v4 UUID will be used.
